title: Domestic two-wheeler sales dip 21 pc in Jan; recovery likely in coming months
description: The low year-on-year sales volume in January, highlights the adverse impact of price hikes, fuel inflation, and Omicron-related concerns on consumer sentiments, said Rohan Kanwar Gupta, Vice President and Sector Head - Corporate Ratings, ICRA Limited.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
